prompt:
Patient: Yeah. Well, I didn't I didn't mention having a wound.

Nurse: I appreciate you letting me know. I'm going to take a moment to figure out the best way I can support you. Give me a moment to check how I can best support you.

Nurse: When did you start having bloody stool?

Patient: Jeez. I don't have bloody stool.

Nurse: I apologize for the confusion. Could you please tell me if you have bloody or black, tarry stool?

Patient: I have pus and mucus in my stool.

Nurse: I apologize for the confusion. I'm here to help. Do you have bloody or black, tarry stool?

Patient: No.

responses.gpt4: I see. Do you have a history of gastrointestinal disease in your family?
